api_list.api_description: Shortens a given URL and returns the shortened version in the specified format.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The original URL you want to shorten.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format in which the response will be returned. Options include 'web', 'simple', 'xml', 'json'.

optional_parameters.name: logstats
optional_parameters.description: Whether to log statistics for the shortened URL.

query: How can I shorten a URL using the isgd API?
